name: Equator Technologies
tagline: Web and Mobile App development experts
description:
We specialize in Web and Mobile application development. We also build tech teams for SMEs/Enterprises and manage them extremely efficiently. These teams augment onshore teams or just work independently to deliver complex projects with very tight deadlines. When it comes to developing Web applications we have delivered applications which use the Microsoft Stack, the LAMP stack and the MEAN stack. We develop native mobile applications mainly for Android and ios.
We also develop hybrid mobile applications based on PhoneGap, Cordova and ReactNative. Our rates are very reasonable and our quality of work is second to none. We take customer service very seriously and work diligently to add value to our clients in every way possible.
